00020 
00021 #include "FileHeaderReader.h"
00022 #include "GenericDataHeaderReader.h"
00023 #include "FileInput.h"
00024 #include <sys/stat.h>
00025 #include <sys/types.h>
00026 
00027 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00028 
00030 #define DATA_FILE_MAGIC_NUMBER 59
00031 
00033 #define DATA_FILE_VERSION_NUMBER 1
00034 
00035 /*
00036  * Constructor
00037  */
00038 FileHeaderReader::FileHeaderReader( std::ifstream& fs, FileHeader &fh)
00039         : fileStream(fs), header(fh)
00040 {
00041         dataGroupCnt = 0;
00042         firstDataGroupFilePos = 0;
00043 }
00044 
00045 /*
00046  * Read the FileHeader from the file.
00047  */
00048 void FileHeaderReader::Read()
00049 {
00050         ReadMagicNumber();
00051         ReadVersion();
00052         ReadDataGroupCnt();
00053         ReadFirstDataGroupFilePos();
00054         ReadGenericDataHdr();
00055 }
00056 
00057 /*
00058  * Reads the file magic number from the file.
00059  */
00060 void FileHeaderReader::ReadMagicNumber()
00061 {
00062         // Read magic number
00063         u_int8_t fileMagicNumber = FileInput::ReadInt8(fileStream);
00064         if (fileMagicNumber != DATA_FILE_MAGIC_NUMBER)
00065         {
00066                 affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::InvalidFileTypeException e;
00067                 throw e;
00068         }
00069 }
00070 
00071 /*
00072  * Reads the generic file version number from the file.
00073  */
00074 void FileHeaderReader::ReadVersion()
00075 {
00076         // Read generic data file version
00077         u_int8_t fileVersionNumber = FileInput::ReadInt8(fileStream);
00078         if (fileVersionNumber != DATA_FILE_VERSION_NUMBER)
00079         {
00080                 affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::InvalidVersionException e;
00081                 throw e;
00082         }
00083 }
00084 
00085 /*
00086  * Reads the DataGroup count from the file.
00087  */
00088 void FileHeaderReader::ReadDataGroupCnt()
00089 {
00090         dataGroupCnt = FileInput::ReadUInt32(fileStream);
00091         header.SetNumDataGroups(dataGroupCnt);
00092 }
00093 
00094 /*
00095  * Reads the file position of the first DataGroup.
00096  */
00097 void FileHeaderReader::ReadFirstDataGroupFilePos()
00098 {
00099         firstDataGroupFilePos = FileInput::ReadUInt32(fileStream);
00100         header.SetFirstDataGroupFilePos(firstDataGroupFilePos);
00101 }
00102 
00103 /*
00104  * Reads the GenericDataHeader from the file.
00105  */
00106 void FileHeaderReader::ReadGenericDataHdr()
00107 {
00108         // Read all the GenericDataHeader
00109         GenericDataHeader gdh;
00110         GenericDataHeaderReader gdhReader(fileStream);
00111         gdhReader.Read(gdh);
00112 
00113         // Set the GenericDataHeader in the FileHeader
00114         header.SetGenericDataHdr(gdh);
00115 }
